name: Laminar Aviation PH
about: Laminar Aviation, based in Subic Bay, Philippines, is a reputable flight school with over 20 years of experience in the aviation industry. We offer comprehensive training programs for private pilot, commercial pilot, and flight instructor certifications, adhering strictly to the standards set by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP). Our fleet includes Cessna 172, 152, 150, and Piper Seneca II aircraft, along with a Redbird MCX flight simulator. We prioritize safety and quality, ensuring our trainees receive top-notch instruction from CAAP-certified ground and flight instructors. With a friendly, family-oriented environment and a proactive staff, Laminar Aviation is committed to transforming your passion into a profession. Join us to achieve your aviation dreams.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
